mapper.select: select sec_idx,sec_name from `exchange`.second_category inner join `exchange`.first_category on second_category.fir_idx=first_category.fir_idx where first_category.fir_idx=#{fir_idx}

select bra_idx,bra_name from `exchange`.brand inner join `exchange`.second_category on brand.sec_idx= second_category.sec_idx inner join `exchange`.first_category on second_category.fir_idx= first_category.fir_idx where second_category.sec_idx=#{sec_idx}

select bra_idx,bra_name from `exchange`.brand inner join `exchange`.second_category on brand.sec_idx= second_category.sec_idx inner join `exchange`.first_category on second_category.fir_idx=first_category.fir_idx where bra_name=#{bra_name} and brand.sec_idx=#{sec_idx}
